item.title: Get Information from Wikipedia via DNS TXT Record Queries
item.description: A short screencast showing how to issue DNS TXT record queries to retrieve information from Wikipedia in a terminal on a Linux based operating system.

item.title: Read a Description of the Linux Filesystem Hierarchy
item.description: Quickly access a description of the directories you typically find in a Linux filesystem by typing `man hier` in a terminal.

item.title: Have You Ever Typed "git" More Often in One Command?
item.description: A short screencast showing how you can clone the git source tree from GitHub.

item.title: Use Objexplore for Inspecting and Debugging Python Code
item.description: A short screencast demonstrating the Python package objexplore with the builtins Python module.

item.title: Quickly Access the ASCII Table from a Terminal
item.description: A short screencast showing the output of the command `man ascii` in a terminal on a Linux based operating system.
